sentences.en: ...hormones that have a narcotic effect on the immune system.
sentences.cn: …对免疫系统有麻醉作用的激素。

sentences.en: As a result, almost 50 years after the agreement was adopted, adequate availability of narcotic drugs for pain treatment remains an unfulfilled promise.
sentences.cn: 因此虽然条约早在50年前被通过，但确保治疗疼痛的麻醉药物供应充足仍是个未兑现的承诺。

sentences.en: Check narcotic record for previous drug count and compare with supply available.
sentences.cn: 核对用药记录,检查以前用药数量及可用药品.

sentences.en: Hazard Wamings for Health: Headache, dizziness, narcotic, vomit and irritation.
sentences.cn: 健康危害效应: 头痛.晕眩. 麻醉, 呕吐,烦躁.

sentences.en: He appears to be high on some sort of narcotic.
sentences.cn: 他看起来飘飘欲仙，像是吸食了某种毒品。

sentences.en: He must be on the narcotic drug when it happened.
sentences.cn: 事情发生的时候他一定服用了毒品.

sentences.en: He took a narcotic drink.
sentences.cn: 他喝了带麻药的饮料.

sentences.en: He was sent to prison narcotic charge.
sentences.cn: 他因(贩毒或吸毒)而被送入监狱.

sentences.en: Major State: Headache, dizziness, narcotic, vomit and irritation.
sentences.cn: 主要症状: 头痛 、 晕眩 、 麻醉 、 呕吐、烦燥.

sentences.en: Methods Injecting narcotic analgesic by a PICC Electronic Analgesia Pump.
sentences.cn: 方法经PICC连接电子镇痛泵,应用麻醉性镇痛药.

sentences.en: Morphine: Heterocyclic compound, narcotic analgesic alkaloid originally isolated from opium.
sentences.cn: 吗啡: 杂环化合物, 从鸦片分离出的麻醉性镇痛药镇痛药生物碱.

sentences.en: narcotic addiction
sentences.cn: 毒瘾

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To investigate the utilization of narcotic analgesics in our hospital.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解麻醉性镇痛药的应用情况.

sentences.en: Opium is a narcotic drug.
sentences.cn: 鸦片是麻醉剂.

sentences.en: Opium is classed under the head of narcotic.
sentences.cn: 鸦片是归入麻醉剂一类的东西.

sentences.en: The juice of this fruit is a mild narcotic.
sentences.cn: 这种果汁有轻度催眠作用.

sentences.en: the narcotics trade
sentences.cn: 毒品交易

sentences.en: The truth of Johnson’s comment was recently brought home to me by the serene calm of a resident who was treating a particularly complicated narcotic-dependent patient.
sentences.cn: 最近，一位住院医生对待一位异常复杂的麻醉药依赖病人的平静态度让我领会到了塞缪尔.约翰逊这句话的真谛。

sentences.en: They use opium as a sedative, rather than as a narcotic.
sentences.cn: 他们把鸦片用作镇静剂而不是毒品。

sentences.en: This is a narcotic substance.
sentences.cn: 这是一种麻醉品.

words.tran_cn: 安眠的,止痛的;使平静的

trans.tran_cn: 麻醉的，催眠的，起麻痹作用的，吸毒成瘾的
trans.tran_en: a narcotic drug takes away pain or makes you sleep
strong illegal drugs such as heroin or cocaine
